Package org.cougaar.core.mobility

This package contains the Cougaar agent mobility support.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MobilityClient Service requestor API for the MobilityService.
MobilityService This service is used by the agent to register with the node's mobility infrastructure.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTicket A ticket describes an agent control request, such as an agent move.
AddTicket A ticket requesting agent creation.
MoveTicket A ticket requesting agent mobility.
RemoveTicket A ticket requesting agent removal.
Ticket Backwards-compatibility for MoveTicket.
 

Exception Summary
MobilityException Base class for mobility failure exceptions.
 

Package org.cougaar.core.mobility Description

This package contains the Cougaar agent mobility support.

The mobility infrastructure is loaded into the node agent by the RootMobilityPlugin, which requires the MobilityDomain's MobilityFactory. Agents register with the MobilityService as MobilityClients to be told when they are moved, which requires them to suspend and capture their persistence state. RootMobilityPlugins in the source and target nodes communicate through Relays to transmit the agent and make sure it is started on the target node before being removed from the source node.

Plugins request agent mobility by interact with the RootMobilityPlugin through blackboard AgentControl objects that specify the requested Ticket command, such as a MoveTicket to move an agent. Additional tickets exist for adding and removing agents.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
